description:
Monster dogs appear and are quickly dispatched by a mysterious figure while Kusanagi and Momiji go on a date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are You Serious? Is This a Dream? An Exciting Date!
Es-tu sérieux ? Est-ce un rêve ? Un rendez-vous excitant !
Maji na no?! Yume na no?! Dokidoki Date!!
マジなの?! 夢なの?! ドキドキデート!!
